TopicTitle: Cannot exit any buildings in KSP 1.12.1

Articles.Content:
Hi i recently installed RP-1 mod in KSP 1.12.1. The issue which i am facing is that i cannot exit any of the buildings that i enter. After clicking leave facility only the science, funds and the toolbars at the bottom comes , but the screen does not changes. When i click escape i cannot quit the game also. Nothing happens when i click on quit game. Plz help me, I really want to play RP-1. Here are the mods that i have installed

Here are the list of mods that i have:
